about_the_game:
Overcome obstacles

"Lava fields and acid pools: because walking on solid ground is just too easy."

Find or buy equipment

"Vending machines: Because sometimes you need a rocket launcher with your soda."

Use the right tool for the job

"When the ambush squad forgets about the shotgun spread. Oops!"

Turn the environment into a weapon

"One shot, one barrel, one big boom!"

Classic pack: 10 levels in Episode 1

"Retro FPS: Where level design confounds even architects."

Game Overview:

Embark on a perilous journey through a malevolent realm, blending classic FPS elements with Shoomerian myths, where madness lurks around every corner. Follow the gripping saga of a bearded soy boy character as he combats hordes of monsters. How long can you teeter on the brink of sanity? Will your testosterone surge or succumb to the grasp of misery?

Distinctive Visuals:

Immerse yourself in hand-drawn graphic design, resembling indie game pixel art. Elevate your gaming experience with enhanced sprites, models, and atmospheric lighting effects. Revel in the vibrant visuals, including juicy blood effects and animated gibs flying in every direction.

Dive into Madness:

Confront nightmares with a diverse array of weapons. Battle evolving enemies, each transforming into progressively more malevolent forms. Brace yourself, as this journey only becomes more challenging!

Gear up and Fight:

Craft your unique playstyle and build a formidable arsenal with a plethora of weapons. Choose from devastating shotguns, lethal rifles, and explosive launchers, each with potent variations designed to wreak havoc and obliterate your foes.

Beefy Soundtrack:

Immerse yourself in the dark Shoomerian atmosphere with a robust soundtrack featuring powerful electric guitar riffs and energetic drums. Slay monsters and confront ancient evils while headbanging to an original soundtrack that will keep you engaged for hours on end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i7 or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ryzen 3700 or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4000 series
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Retro FPS with dynamic fights and modern lighting. Sprite enemies once again flooded some pixel art-decorated levels. Only boomer-shooter enjoyer could deal with such kind of problem. You know the drill - gear up with a classic weapons pack and paint it red.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
